summary: Completed final verification testing. Authentication system is working properly - users must login to access dashboard. Backend APIs are 85.7% functional. Critical signup issue remains: Date of Birth field still cannot be filled, preventing new user registration completion. Dashboard loads for authenticated users but shows API errors.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 404 Not Found - API endpoint not found

dashboard_api_issues.issue: Frontend shows 'Failed to load transactions' and 400 Bad Request errors
dashboard_api_issues.impact: Dashboard shows error message instead of user data
dashboard_api_issues.details: Console shows: Failed to load dashboard data: Error: Failed to load transactions

working_correctly.status: WORKING - Demo login successful with alice@demo.com/password123

critical_bugs.issue: Date of Birth input field still cannot be filled - field remains empty despite fill attempts
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Prevents new user registration completion as DOB is required
critical_bugs.details: Field with placeholder 'mm/dd/yyyy' is not responding to fill() actions. Issue persists from iteration 6.

critical_bugs.issue: Dashboard shows 'Failed to load dashboard' error message
critical_bugs.impact: HIGH - Users see error instead of banking data after successful login
critical_bugs.details: Console errors: 'Failed to load transactions' with 400 Bad Request responses

security_working_correctly.status: WORKING - Dashboard properly redirects to login when accessed without authentication
WORKING - Demo login (alice@demo.com/password123) successfully redirects to dashboard
WORKING - Users must login to access their unique banking dashboard

ui_working_correctly.status: WORKING - Page loads successfully with proper form layout
WORKING - Name, Email, Password, Mobile, SSN, Address fields accept input correctly
FIXED - Terms checkbox now works properly (was broken in iteration 6)
WORKING - Password strength indicator shows 'Very Strong' with proper validation
WORKING - All form sections display correctly with proper styling

console_warnings.issue: Content Security Policy violations for api-production.creao.ai and ip-api.com
console_warnings.impact: LOW - Does not affect core functionality but should be addressed

passed_tests: Authentication system properly protects dashboard access
Users are redirected to login when accessing dashboard without authentication
Backend health check responds correctly (200 OK)
User registration API endpoint works (POST /api/auth/register returns 201)
Most protected API endpoints return 200 status (accounts, transactions, KYC)
Signup form loads successfully with proper layout
Basic form fields accept input correctly (name, email, password, mobile, SSN, address)
Terms checkbox now works properly (fixed from iteration 6)

success_percentage.backend: 85.7% - Most APIs functional, minor profile endpoint issue, dashboard data loading issues
success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Authentication and most UI working, but critical DOB field issue and dashboard errors remain
success_percentage.authentication: 100% - Properly implemented, users must login to access dashboard

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Date of Birth field in signup form - field is not responding to input (prevents new user registration). HIGH: Fix dashboard data loading errors causing 'Failed to load transactions' messages. MEDIUM: Implement missing /api/profile endpoint. LOW: Address CSP violations for external API calls.
